name: Top Secret (itch) (Nico)
description:
[A WS D] movement

            [Shift] accelerate.

            [E] interact with various stuff in the game

            mouse to rotate.


Game made for the game jam One Game a Month 20.

all the assets used in game (graphics, musics, scripts..) are made by me during the jam time.

if you like the music, you can use it...
